room_title: Escape room "Lost in Space" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: It was my first experience at exit strategy. We did Lost in space enjoyed a lot with new friends and finally we escaped it!

room_title: Escape room "Lost in Space" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: We did the “Lost In Space” room at Exit Strategy in Charlotte Tuesday night. There were 6 of us and we had a great time. We loved our host, Kiersten, who stayed in character the entire time, even when gIving us clues. She knew how to help us have fun!! Everyone there was very nice and friendly. We will go back to do the “Murder Mystery” room next. There are also other rooms that we want to do. Loved and recommend this place for fun!

room_title: Escape room "Lost in Space" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: Some coworkers and I did the Lost in Space room today. We had so much fun! Kelly was amazing! We will definitely be back very soon! Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Lost in Space" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: My friends and I love it here! We didn't make it out of our first room, but we did the second room and that feeling is like no other! And awesome staff- they really stay in character!

room_title: Escape room "Lost in Space" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: We went for Father's Day this past Saturday and had a great time! Although we didn't win the "Lost in Space" room, we still had a fun time working together to try to solve the clues. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I would defintely recommend this for team building events!
